projects.name: Weather app
projects.bio: An interactive weather app that fetches current API data for today and a 4-day forecast. The app theme shifts with the time of day from daytime to nighttime colors and icons using Typescript/Javascript.

projects.name: Accessibility For All
projects.bio: An easy to navigate, WCAG [AAA] rated site design, that offers users a quick and informative quiz on accessibility-friendly, aka a11y, guidelines.

projects.name: Recipe Library app
projects.bio: Simple and clean app for getting fresh recipe inspirations. Users can choose popular cuisine filters or sort by time to narrow the options, as well as a fun, random recipe button. Almost entirely Javascript-built for functionality and features.

projects.name: First self-coded project: The Stockholm Buzz
projects.bio: My original homemade, from scratch, business-inspired website fully coded with HTML and CSS and just a few tears (whether from joy, panic or relief remains a trade-secret). Updated to meet WCAG standards for an accessible user experience.
